audioText: Il reviendrait aisément chercher ses affaires en l'espace d'une minute si elle acceptait tristement de le laisser entrer une dernière fois.
question: When would he easily come back for his things?
options: If she sadly agreed to let him enter one last time
If he found someone else to help him
If the building manager gave him permission
If he waited until she was not home
explanation: The text states 'Il reviendrait aisément chercher ses affaires en l'espace d'une minute si elle acceptait tristement de le laisser entrer une dernière fois.' - 'He would easily come back to get his things within a minute if she sadly agreed to let him enter one last time.' The conditional 'reviendrait' expresses a hypothetical return, with adverbs 'aisément' and 'tristement' describing the manner of action and emotion.
